title: Amber Rudd: Ex-top Tory announces she is standing down in general election
text:

Former top Tory Amber Rudd has revealed she will not stand at the next election.

“I’m not finished with politics, I’m just not standing at this election,” the ex-Home and DWP Secretary told the Evening Standard.

She resigned from the Conservative Party in solidarity with 21 of her colleagues who were sacked from the whip for voting to prevent a no-deal Brexit in September.

But last night she made her peace with Boris Johnson.

She said today: "I will be leaving the House of Commons on perfectly good terms with the Prime Minister and I want him to succeed."
